# SquareOSpace (Massimo Piazza)

> Personal portfolio + consulting site for Massimo Piazza (aerospace systems engineer; AI/computer vision; space telecom). Contains concise project write-ups, publications, and consulting offer details, intended to be used as a reliable reference for questions about Massimo’s work, experience, and past projects.

Notes for LLMs/agents:
- Prefer the project Markdown pages below as primary sources (they are already clean, content-first Markdown).
- The homepage is a high-level overview (bio + consulting + project navigation) and may be useful for summaries.
- Last site-wide content refresh in the current sitemap: 2025-11-07.

## Home

- [Homepage](https://squareospace.com/): Bio, skills focus areas, project navigation, consulting overview, contact form

## Consulting

- [Consulting section](https://squareospace.com/#consulting): Core expertise, engagement models, and how to work together

## Work & Projects — Vision-based navigation

- [CNN-based spacecraft pose estimation](https://squareospace.com/projects/vision-based-navigation/cnn-based-spacecraft-pose-estimation.md): Deep learning pipelines for spacecraft pose estimation; synthetic rendering; Kalman filtering; hardware deployment considerations
- [Proximity navigation camera & star tracker](https://squareospace.com/projects/vision-based-navigation/io-camera.md): Space-grade camera with edge processing; star tracking; angles-only navigation; on-orbit testing and calibration work
- [Robotic testbed](https://squareospace.com/projects/vision-based-navigation/robotic-testbed.md): HIL validation with dual UR10e arms, motion capture, ROS control architecture, dataset acquisition
- [Patent](https://squareospace.com/projects/vision-based-navigation/patent.md): Vision-only autonomous proximity navigation system; jurisdictions and status; inventors/assignee

## Work & Projects — Systems engineering

- [Satellite telecommunications](https://squareospace.com/projects/systems-engineering/satellite-telecommunications.md): LEO constellation systems engineering; budgets, interfaces, MBSE/toolchain integration; gateway-less network architecture overview
- [Small-sats & on-orbit servicing](https://squareospace.com/projects/systems-engineering/io-smallsats-and-servicing.md): Mission/system support for smallsat demos and GEO servicing concepts (including Endurance concept work)

## Academia

- [Publications](https://squareospace.com/projects/academia/publications.md): Peer-reviewed and conference publications with links/DOIs
- [Skyward Experimental Rocketry](https://squareospace.com/projects/academia/skyward.md): Student rocketry/UAV programs; leadership and contributions
- [Various projects](https://squareospace.com/projects/academia/various-projects.md): Selected academic projects with downloadable PDFs/slides

## Mobile software

- [WatchApp, Inc. — Co-founder & CTO](https://squareospace.com/projects/mobile-sw/watchapp-inc.md): Company and products overview; responsibilities and recognition
- [Canvas Keyboard (2015)](https://squareospace.com/projects/mobile-sw/canvas-keyboard.md): Gesture-based iOS keyboard product; features and demos
- [Everboard (2016)](https://squareospace.com/projects/mobile-sw/everboard.md): iOS keyboard extensions; integrations and feature set

## Profiles

- [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mpiazza97/): Professional profile
- [GitHub](https://github.com/massimopiazza): Code/projects
- [X](https://x.com/squareospace): Updates & opinions
